GSD.product_version: versions from v3.12 to before v5.4.165
GSD.description:
nfc: fix potential NULL pointer deref in nfc_genl_dump_ses_done

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.165 by commit 48fcd08fdbe05e35b650a252ec2a2d96057a1c7a, it was introduced in version v3.12 by commit ac22ac466a659f1b2e02a2e2ee23fc5c42da2c95. For more details please see the references link.
